lead_paragraph: California Chrome is 1 1/2 miles away from ending the longest drought in racing history — 36 years without a Triple Crown winner.

headline.main: California Chrome Chases History in Belmont Stakes
headline.print_headline: California Chrome Chases History in Belmont Stakes
